attributes.title: SRIKAILASHA Is All About Peace Based Powerfulness!
attributes.description:
13 DECEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG. 
  
TODAY’S MESSAGE FROM SRIKAILASHA: SHANTI BASED SHAKTI. MUKTHI BASED BHAKTI. BHAKTI BASED MUKTI. 

KAILAASA GROWS IN THE SPACE OF SHANTI. IT IS IN THE DEEP POWERFULNESS OF PEACE OR PEACE CENTERED POWERFULNESS IS THE BREEDING GROUND FOR PARAMASHIVATVA TO MANIFEST. 

LIKE HOW PURE MIRROR REFLECTS EVERYTHING. PURE SHANTI BASED SHAKTI, PARAMASHIVA REFLECTS IN PEACE BASED POWERFULNESS. NEITHER VIOLENCE, NOR POWERLESSNESS. POWERLESSNESS IS WEAKNESS. VIOLENCE IS ABUSIVE. 

MORE AND MORE UNCLUTCHING LEADS TO MORE AND MORE POWER MANIFESTATION. MORE AND MORE POWER MANIFESTATION LEADS TO MORE AND MORE PEACE. PEACE BASED POWERFULNESS IS FUNDAMENTAL REQUIREMENT FOR PARAMASHIVA TO MANIFEST. ALL VEDA AGAMIC TRUTHS LEADS TO PEACE AND POWERFULNESS. BECAUSE ALL UPANISHADS STARTS AND GETS COMPLETED WITH SHANTI MANTRA - “OM SHANTI SHANTI SHANTIHI.” THERE ARE ABOUT 60 MANTRAS THROUGHOUT THE VEDAS USED IN MULTIPLE PLACES. 

THAT IS WHY PEOPLE WHO DO NOT WANT PARAMASHIVATVA TO MANIFEST DO NOT WANT PEACE IN OUR CAMPUS. BUT, ONLY WHEN YOU ARE PEACEFUL WHERE YOU CANNOT BE DISTRUBED BY DEMONS, DEVILS AND RAKSHASHAS. 

REMEMBER THIS CLEARLY! PEACE ALTERS THE VERY DNA STRUCTURE. THE CORE ANU, MAHAT STRUCTURE. THE CONSCIOUSNESS IN YOU IS ATOM INSIDE THE ATOM. THAT CONSCIOUSNESS STARTS GROWING IN YOU WITH MORE AND MORE PEACE BASED POWERFULNESS DEVELOPING IN YOU. NOTHING CAN BE COMPARED TO UNCLUTCHING! 

SPEND MORE AND MORE TIME AND ENERGY IN UNCLUTCHING. IT WILL NEVER BE WASTED! TIME SPENT IN UNCLUTCHING IS THE MOST PRODUCTIVE! IT EXPLODES YOUR CORE MOLECULAR, DNA, GENETIC STRUCTURE, 8 ENERGY CIRCUITS (7 ENERGY FLOW CIRCUIT + 1 PURE CONSCIOUS EXPLOSION)  EXPLODES WHEN YOU UNCLUTCH! 

UNCLUTCHING IS THE SPACE OF SRIKAILASHA. ALL MY DISCIPLES, SRIKAILASHAS, AADHEENAMS, TEMPLES, GURUKUL, PERSON, PLACE ASSOCIATED WITH ME SHOULD RADIATE THE POWER OF UNCLUTCHING. ABSOLUTE PEACE CENTERED POWERFULNESS. ALL OUR TEMPLES, ASHRAMS, DEVOTEES WHO FOLLOWS ME - THIS IS THE BRAND YOUR THREE EYES SHOULD RADIATE, “PEACE CENTERED POWERFULNESS.”

PEOPLE VISITING SHOULD BE WONDERING ‘ SO MUCH OF ATTACK EVERYWHERE ON THEM, BUT THE DISCIPLES AND DEVOTEES ARE VERY PEACEFUL.” NEITHER VIOLENT, AGITATED OR POWERLESSNESS. ABSOLUTE PEACE! PEACE ESTABLISHED IN POWERFULNESS, POWERFULNESS ESTABLISHED IN PEACE. 

ALL THE DEVOTEES WHO I LOVE SINCERELY AND ARE IN LOVE WITH ME. WITH ALL MY INTEGRITY, I PROMISE, “PARAMASHIVA IS REAL. SRIKAILASHA IS REAL. KALABHAIRAVA IS REAL. NANDI IS REAL. GANAPATI IS REAL. SUBRAMANYA IS REAL. PARASHAKTI IS REAL., VISHNU IS REAL. THE SPACE OF SRIKAILASHA IS REAL.”

JUST TO TELL THIS TO ALL OF YOU AND INSPIRE AND GIVE YOU GLIMPSE OF THIS EXPERIENCE SO THAT THE VIRTUOUS CIRCLE WILL START IN YOU. ONCE I INITIATE YOU AND YOU GET AN EXPERIENCE, THEN PARAMASHIVA GIVES YOU MORE EXPERIENCE. PUSHING THE START OF THE VIRTUOUS CIRCLE IS THE JOB OF GURU. MAINTAINING THE CYCLE AND MAKING IT GO FAST IS THE JOB OF LINGA AND SANGHA. 

THAT IS WHY I RECOMMEND ALL THE VIEWERS TO ATTEND THE ATMA LINGA PROGRAM ON 14TH AND 15TH DECEMBER 2019 - ATMA LINGA MANDALA PROCESS AND VISHESHA DEEKSHA INITIATION. ALL OF YOU WILL RECEIVE ATMA LINGA MADE FROM THE MATERIAL FROM SPACE OF KAILAASA. SPACE OF KAILAASA WHEN BROUGHT TO PLANET EARTH IS SPATIKA. IT IS A COMPLETELY FREE PROGRAM. YOU CAN COME TO ANY OF OUR TEMPLES, ASHRAMS, GURUKULS, UNIVERSITIES AND RECEIVE THE ATMA LINGA. PLEASE GO TO PROGRAMS.NITHYANANDA.ORG/ATMALINGA TO REGISTER. 

PEACE BASED POWERFULNESS IS THE FRAGRANCE OF SRIKAILASHA. BRING EXTREME PEACE. PEACE CENTERED POWERFULNESS IS POWER MANIFESTATION. DO MORE AND MORE COMPLETION AND UNCLUTCHING INSIDE. THROW ALL THE RUBBISH OUT BY CATHARTIC PROCESSES  - DO SAMSKARA DAHANA KRIYA(SDK) , MRIGA SHARIRA PROCESS, NIRAHARA SAMYAMA AND UNCLUTCHING TO DETOX. YOU WILL BE ABLE TO FIND UPLOADED SATSANGS, GUIDED MEDITATION PROCESSES FOR SAMSKARA DAHANA KRIYA, MRIGA SHARIRA PROCESS, AND UNCLUTCHING AND NIRAHARA SAMYAMA ON https://www.youtube.com/LIFEBLISSFOUN...
